name: meds
description: Manage a list of medications and get renewal alarms

scripts.bundle: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config config/webpack.config.js && npm run zip
scripts.zip: rm -f public/*.gz public/**/*.gz && zopfli public/*.* public/**/*.*
scripts.server: npm run bundle && NODE_ENV=production node server
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
